name: Robot Creemee! Red – Kids
description:
Ahhh…summer time in Vermont. A late afternoon dip in the river to cool off and then straight to the local creemee stand to grab a cone of your favorite flavor. (Give Maple a try!) A rarely known fact brought to light on this shirt is that Robots love Creemee even more than we humans do.

Shirt color Red.

Kids shirt is 100% cotton Gildan youth tee.

Free shipping on orders over $50. Enter promo code: FREESHIP

Note: If you are local and would prefer to pickup your shirt just enter the promo code: pickup when you are in your shopping cart.

name: Maple Buddah Chocolate – Mens
description: When fall descends on Vermont and the leaves begin to turn there's a breathtaking display of color that sets the mountains on visual fire. With fall comes a transition to a more contemplative time of the year…a time for reflection, peace and appreciation for all the beauty of Vermont. Maple Buddah – Zen on tap. Shirt color Chocolate Men's shirt is Pre-shrunk 4.5 oz 100% combed ring spun cotton, fashion fit cut from Anvil. Features a TearAway™ label. Anvil Sizing chart Free shipping on orders over $50. Enter promo code: FREESHIP Note: If you are local and would prefer to pickup your shirt just enter the promo code: pickup when you are in your shopping cart.

name: Vermont Stella Quarta Decima – Mens - GREEN
description: This design is adapted from the copper coinage that was minted when Vermont was still an independent state way back in 1785. "Stella quarta decima " translates to "The Fourteenth Star"….part of Vermont's bid to become the 14th State. Shirt color: Kelly Green Available in Yellow on Kelly Green Men's shirt is Pre-shrunk 4.5 oz 100% combed ring spun cotton, fashion fit cut from Anvil. Features a TearAway™ label. Anvil Sizing chart Free shipping on orders over $50. Enter promo code: FREESHIP If you are local and would prefer to pickup your shirt just enter the promo code: pickup when you are in your shopping cart.

name: Mad River Valley Icon Bumper Sticker
description:
Adapted design from the Mad River Valley Icon shirt. Show your love for The Valley.

High quality screen printed sticker on heavy vinyl with UV coating. Guaranteed to hold up to the gnarly Vermont winters.

Size is 6"w x 2"h

name: Mad River Valley Icon – Kids
description: An ode to one of the most beautiful and unique valleys in Vermont. Mad River Valley or "The Valley" as locals call it, consists of 50+ local farms, 5 towns, 2 awesome ski areas, and 1 beautiful river threading through this amazing, creative community Shirt color Kelly Green. Kids shirt is 100% cotton Anvil or Gildan youth tee. Anvil Sizing chart Free shipping on orders over $50. Enter promo code: FREESHIP Note: If you are local and would prefer to pickup your shirt just enter the promo code: pickup when you are in your shopping cart.

description:

Shirt color Caribeaan blue. 

Kids shirt is 100% cotton Anvil or Gildan youth tee.
